channel.title: Pages on Luks
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Luks

item.title: Whoami
item.description: Hi friend! My name is Lucas aka Luks. I’m a 5th year student in the field of computer security. CTF player, I started my learning on TryHackMe, now mainly on Hack The Box. What is the purpose of this blog ? I created this blog to share my Hack The Box write-ups with the community, it’s the best way to learn imho. But also my retex on certifications, security events, CTFs etc.
